text: Odalis Amadol Pérez (June 11, 1977 – March 10, 2022) was a Dominican professional baseball starting pitcher. He played with the Atlanta Braves from 1998 until 2001, the Los Angeles Dodgers from 2002 until 2006, the Kansas City Royals from 2006 until 2007, and the Washington Nationals in 2008. Pérez was born in Las Matas de Farfán, Dominican Republic. Pérez died on March 10, 2022 in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic after falling of a ladder at his home, aged 44. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Atlanta Braves players Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Kansas City Royals players Category:Washington Nationals players Category:Dominican Republic baseball players
title: Odalis Pérez
